item.description:
Hosts for the evening Victor and Susan Niederhoffer at the Weston, CT Niederhoffer Mansion.


As OUR America Initiative Honorary Chairman, Gov. Johnson has traveled to more than 30 states and spoken to over 150 conservative and libertarian groups since December of last year. These appearances include the Governorâ€™s keynote addresses to the Maryland and West Virginia state Republican Party Conventions and his speech at the 9-12 Tea Party Rally on the National Mall.


On behalf of Gov. Johnson and Mr. & Mrs. Niederhoffer, I hope that you will be able to join us on December 11th. There is no charge to attend, but gifts to the OUR America Initiative are welcome. If you have any further questions about Gov. Johnson or the event, please feel free to contact me via e-mail or by phone at (202) 503-6551. Thank you for your time and we look forward to seeing you on the 11th!


Jonathan Bydlak
Finance Director
OUR America Initiative


I do not have the address for the event at this time. I have requested it. Will post as soon as received.

barbara g.
item.name: Meet Gov. Gary Johnson at the Niederhoffer Mansion
